title: On the tip of my tongue
content:
My roommate came to me wanting to ID this typeface and I can't for the life of me remember... mostly because I never use it.

it's the logo at the top of the page at this site: [http://www.orabrush.com/how-to-cure-and-get-rid-of-bad-breath.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041151/http:/www.orabrush.com/how-to-cure-and-get-rid-of-bad-breath.php "http://www.orabrush.com/how-to-cure-and-get-rid-of-bad-breath.php")
author: kamolahy

comments.content: Don't know the exact name but [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041151/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-bauhaus/medium/) is pretty similar.
[Chalet Nineteen Seventy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041151/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet) with a modified t and g

Maybe a mix of the Chalet fonts.

- Mike Yanega
